languages.text: "Недалеко от трупа была найдена кровавая синт-шинель. Достаньте свои, уважаемые блюстители".
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."
languages.original_text: "Недалеко от трупа была найдена кровавая синт-шинель. Достаньте свои, уважаемые блюстители".

traits.locale_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. Please produce yours, honourable enforcers."
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. Please produce yours, honourable enforcers."
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. Please produce yours, honourable enforcers."
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. Please produce yours, honourable enforcers."
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."
"A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."

languages.text: "Unweit der Leiche wurde ein blutiger Synthetikmantel gefunden. Die Enforcer in diesem Raum sollen ihre Mäntel vorzeigen."
languages.original_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."

traits.locale_text: "Unweit der Leiche wurde ein blutiger Synthetikmantel gefunden. Die Enforcer in diesem Raum sollen ihre Mäntel vorzeigen."

languages.text: « Un manteau synthétique taché de sang a été découvert non loin du corps. Que les prévôts ici présents présentent leurs manteaux. »
languages.original_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."

traits.locale_text: « Un manteau synthétique taché de sang a été découvert non loin du corps. Que les prévôts ici présents présentent leurs manteaux. »

languages.text: «Se ha encontrado un abrigo sintético ensangrentado no muy lejos del cadáver. Quiero que los guardias presentes en esta sala me enseñen sus abrigos».
languages.original_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha encontrado un abrigo sintético ensangrentado no muy lejos del cadáver. Quiero que los guardias presentes en esta sala me enseñen sus abrigos».

languages.text: 「死体にほど近い場所で血塗れのシンセコートが発見された。この部屋にいるエンフォーサーは、自分のコートを見せよ」
languages.original_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."

traits.locale_text: 「死体にほど近い場所で血塗れのシンセコートが発見された。この部屋にいるエンフォーサーは、自分のコートを見せよ」

languages.text: “我们在离尸体不远的地方发现了一件沾了血的合成外套，我想请房间里所有执法者把各自的外套拿出来。”
languages.original_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."

traits.locale_text: “我们在离尸体不远的地方发现了一件沾了血的合成外套，我想请房间里所有执法者把各自的外套拿出来。”

languages.text: "Kan içinde kalmış bir sentetik kaban bulundu. Cesetten çok da uzak değildi. Ben olsam bu odadaki infazcılardan kabanlarını göstermelerini isterdim."
languages.original_text: "A bloody synth-coat was discovered not far from the corpse. I would ask the enforcers in this room to present their coats."
